column2: Well hello there. Something very peculiar is happening with Roster. Can you have a look at it with me?
Roster is behaving strangely. I think something has gotten in and corrupted it.
So let's see how this goes. Launch the Roster app.
Click the Roster app on the desktop.
Curses! You're seeing it too! Very strange. I wonder what's causing this. See if you can hack in and fix the text so everything's readable again.
You're going to need to hack the app to bring back that text.
Where is that key? Must have dropped it somehow. Gotta fix this pocket.
Excellent! I see you've found the key! Good, good. Now, get in there and do your magic and fix this corruption.
What might be going on with that text to make it invisible?
Maybe some of the colors are transparent. Try changing them in the Hack panel.
Flip the screen back again to see your results.
Ah, much better! I see you've got a knack for hacking! For that, I'm giving you a reward.
This key will let you start doing some actual coding to keep your skills sharp. See you at the Clubhouse.

Smart solution! Wait a sec, what's this strange item?

How did this get into Roster? Or did Saniel drop it again? Weird. Anyway, take it.
It's been fun to explore things with you! Hope you'll come back ;)
All done already? Okay then, Come back soon. We've got our work cut out for us!
